QuestData.Title: The Night Warrior
QuestData.Description:
It appears these night elves won't give up the information easily... but perhaps that wisp you captured will.
See if you can get it to reveal what happened here. I don't care how you do it.
Father Norlath will handle the wisp from there.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with the Lost Wisp to find out why the moon turned dark.
